name: Starmatter
description:
A game created for Global Game Jam 2020, on the theme of "Repair". Made at GGJ Brighton!

The ESS Anglia is investigating unusual energy readings from a nearby star. You are the ship's Chief Engineer, and this is a perfectly normal mission.

At least, until it isn't.

Use the arrow keys to move and advance through dialogue. Walk into objects and people to interact with them.

The game is made with Bitsy by Adam Le Doux, with hacks from the Bitsy Hack Repo maintained by Sean S. LeBlanc. Additional art in Aseprite.

This game is dedicated to Becky, Jo andSarah. Thank you for running an astounding jam space!
